alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Craven; Hyde; Martin; Pamlico; Pitt; Tyrrell; Washington (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 9:25PM EDT until August 07 at 10:15PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Newport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Washington County in eastern North Carolina... Northern Craven County in eastern North Carolina... Eastern Pitt County in eastern North Carolina... Northwestern Hyde County in eastern North Carolina... Southeastern Martin County in eastern North Carolina... Beaufort County in eastern North Carolina... Tyrrell County in eastern North Carolina... Northeastern Pamlico County in eastern North Carolina... * Until 1015 PM EDT. * At 925 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles east of Williamston to 7 miles northwest of Pinetown to near Wilmar, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Washington, Plymouth, River Road, Belhaven, Killkenny, Swindell Fork, Sladesville, Ransomville, Ponzer, Scranton, Pinetown, Gum Neck, Kilkenny, Fairfield, Pungo, Blounts Creek, Pamlico Beach, Lowland, Columbia and Wilmar. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please send your reports of hail and/or wind damage, including trees or large limbs downed, by calling the National Weather Service office in Newport at 1-800-889-6889.

area.areaDesc: Beaufort; Craven; Hyde; Martin; Pamlico; Pitt; Tyrrell; Washington
